channel.title: Quest interface (Hybrid Pvp V.3)
channel.description: Ok, soo im still learning my way around the new sources. But i want to know how to make a quest interface popup. And write text to it? Kind of like they type ::rules and a quest interface pops up showing all the rules i have typed up through the server.
